website_summaries.verdict: Classic pen-style eyeliner is easy to use and produces bold, pigmented lines.
pros: Simple pen design is comfortable to hold, allowing for a steady hand and fast application
Liner is available in multiple colors, including a bold sea blue and a fun, flirty periwinkle
Pointed felt tip glides on easily and is capable of producing thin or thick lines
Product dries quickly and is easy to wash off with a makeup wipe
cons: Felt tip does collect some eye shadow, but it's easy enough to wipe off on the back of your hand or a tissue

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Why did it take 49 years to find the perfect eyeliner!! For starters I suck at putting eyeliner on so I normally would only use it when I went out socially. I’d have to bring Qtips with me to constantly clean under my eyes and wipe away at the smudges at the corners. This eyeliner is amazing! I’m still not the greatest at applying it but this goes on so smooth and precise that it’s almost perfect. It doesn’t smudge or melt like any other eyeliner I have used. I keep waiting to pull the Qtip out but I haven’t had to. I wear it everyday! Sooooo happy!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer gugger

customer_reviews.title: My Go-To From Now On
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is wild. I kept buying random big name brands of eyeliner thinking one of them had to be good and not smear and smudge after 1-2 hours. A friend recommended this line to me and I am never going back. I wore this for a full work day and it didnt budge. On top of that, I went on an almost THREE MILE RUN, too lazy to take it off before, and it was still perfect afterwards! If you're looking for a lasting liner, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Product in general is Garbage!!  WASTE OF MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: Not the sellers fault this is the actual product failure buyer beware do not buy this liner!! I keep very very good care of my make up and this eyeliner dried out within a month and I only used it twice in 1 month and the cap was on the whole time and it was in my bathroom drawer. I did a lot of research on this product and it said it would not come off with watery eyes or crying well it did and it dried out not worth my money!
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Cry all you want and look amazing
customer_reviews.text: I found my cat had passed away in my hallway last night. I put on makeup today and this photo is after ~6 hours of crying on and off. I am wearing Sephora brand eyelashes as well. Highly recommend 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt buy again
customer_reviews.text: I am not really satisfied with this eyeliner, despite the hype. The ink seems not distribute evenly so it looks somewhat splotchy and not like what I see in pictures. I may have gotten a dud. It also smudges easily, and the brush tip requires a fair amount of maintenance even though I do not wear eyeshadow or other substances that would clog it.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit disappointed. it kinda wears off along the lash line during the day. that's weird for me, because I NEVER have to reapply my eyeliner. Never have - even in middle school. If I didn't feel weird about returning something I used on my eyes (and I don't have the box anymore), I'd return it. :( I had heard great things about this brand, but now I'm kinda meh about it.
customer_reviews.author: geminimoon

customer_reviews.title: Everything I was hoping for!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fine tip felt point!! It doesn't interfere with getting ink on my eyelashes like liquids with brush tips do. I draw big wings that I fill in. This pin can create very a very sharp point, but has sufficient ink to fill in the wing. It dries immediately and stays on all day. I'm so happy I found this product!!! Please do not every stop making it and do not change anything!!!
customer_reviews.author: betty Sperry

customer_reviews.title: Good Eyeliner, but it fades with moisture
customer_reviews.text: I like this eyeliner a lot. I just wish that it stayed super pigmented. Unfortunately, it dries a little slowly and if your eyes are in anyway moist, the pigmentation fades. It is, however, better than most liquid eyeliners I have used and it doesn't require rubbing with eye makeup remover to clean it off.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Opheim

customer_reviews.title: It lives up to the hype
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner has great staying power, and doesn't smudge if you itch your eyes by accident. If you do rub your eyes it just kind of balls up and disappears, so even though on its own it does not budge, it's very easy to remove. I find that application is a little bit awkward, the pen doesn't draw as smoothly as I would like and the felt tip occasionally gets some stray fibers that can muck up the line. However, on the formula alone this is still a good eyeliner for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Marzipan

customer_reviews.title: The Best!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Eyeliner!!! First one I have ever used -color was great.easy to apply,no smearing or running and looks fabulous !!! Well worth the price which is not bad for a GREAT Eyeliner!!! Highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Townsend

customer_reviews.title: love this more than tatoo liner!
customer_reviews.text: I actually got this by accident. I've been using tatoo liner forever, and I actually prefer this to that b/c this has a felt tip which I found way more pigmented than the brush from tatoo liner. Because of the felt tip/more pigmentation, it is also much faster to do makeup in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this brand!! I am a fan!! I little pricey but nothing is as easy to apply and lasts overnight. I use it as my daily go to for eye "touch up" at the outer corners and gorgeous lasting glam look.
customer_reviews.author: DeAquitaine

customer_reviews.title: The make up is good, the applicator is meh.
customer_reviews.text: I'm really bummed at the new sponge tip applicator. The one they used for years was much easier for application (synthetic hair fibers).
customer_reviews.author: Molly M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Questionable authenticity?
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product many time before however this particular tube didn't seem right. It was more watery and ran when I was applying it and that NEVER has happened. Something is up but it might not be genuine.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: unsure it's actual product
customer_reviews.text: This is not a bad eyeliner. It could dry faster, so if you have heavy lids you need to give it a few seconds more than average to dry. The box came in a plastic bag. The box was slightly askew and I was a little worried because the box had not tape on it. I assume it's actual product. Wore today for first time and it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Humanitarian

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, this crap lasts through ANYTHING
customer_reviews.text: I love it. so much. I've been using this for a very long time and it still works wonders. I don't wing often, but when I do, I only trust Kat von d. it's lasted first dates, break ups, car wrecks, literally everything and stayed put. 13/10 will continue to buy for the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.author: kate francis

customer_reviews.title: My favorite eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite eyeliner! Liquid but easy to use. Love this brand, love the color, love everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But I do like how soft the tip is
customer_reviews.text: Don’t rub your eyes on accident, it will wipe away. But I do like how soft the tip is. I went swimming and it stayed on but once I forgot I was wearing eyeliner and rubbed my eyes, it went away
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn enriquez

customer_reviews.title: This is the first eyeliner that not only is easy for me to use but does not run
customer_reviews.text: This is the first eyeliner that not only is easy for me to use but does not run
customer_reviews.author: Janet O

customer_reviews.title: bleeds
customer_reviews.text: Bleeds a little, does not dry fast, disappointed because i paid so much
customer_reviews.author: cassandra h.

customer_reviews.title: Best Eyeliner!!
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by my niece, and it is by far the best eyeliner I have used. Nice deep color and stays on longer than any other liner that I have purchased before.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: I expected more
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes it would stand against my watery eyes... But no. I went back to using Stila which lasts a little longer... Still waiting for someone to invent the perfect one!
customer_reviews.author: SSJ

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and Smooth
customer_reviews.text: It's great. I just don't like that Kat Von D is an anti vaxxer but at least this product is cruelty free.
customer_reviews.author: A.K.M

customer_reviews.title: Great... as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Always my fav! Love this product and it is a bit of a discount from department stores
customer_reviews.author: Pagianna

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: great product, and great value for your money. Order delivered promptly and in good shape, all good
customer_reviews.author: David Ickowicz

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner ever
customer_reviews.text: One of the best eyeliners love it lasts long and doesn't run.
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: Simply Happy
customer_reviews.text: Buy it! :) Worth it! I love this liner. It was my first liquid liner and I am so glad I went with this one first. Love this product! :)
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: I’d rather spend $20 for a real one.
customer_reviews.text: Worked good, but didn’t last as long as the REAL KVD eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Moua

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Item received was not in new condition. Product has already run out after less than 2 weeks. Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: dk

customer_reviews.title: The pen cane dried out, not in a box, and empty!
customer_reviews.text: This was very disappointing. It is dried out and empty. A total waste of $29.99! I’m just going to continue getting it from Sephora instead. Normally, Kat Von D Ink Liner-Trooper is great.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Pieper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect line every time!
customer_reviews.text: I love KVD make up. This eyeliner is my favorite. Will continue to buy. It draws on without being too inky (NYX blobs). Stays all day!
customer_reviews.author: PRBrooks

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So ita the second time i buy this liner, its really easy to apply in any way, really bald pigment, lasts for a long time, the only thing i can say that it takes a really long time to dry. Even so i like this product
customer_reviews.author: Mei L.

customer_reviews.title: I could not believe how fake or old the eyeliner ...
customer_reviews.text: I could not believe how fake or old the eyeliner was DRY and I want to return it. I paid the same price I would hav at a store
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: This isn’t the REAL PRODUCT no WAY
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what you people sold me but it is clearly not Kat Von D liner. The packaging says water proof and starts running down your face with the first spritz of setting spray JUNK
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this liner because of all the great reviews but don't waste your money. I used it once. Then the tip started to fray and it has completely dried out at the tip. So, I'm back using my Maybelline eye gel.
customer_reviews.author: Laura K. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Best liquid liner out there!
customer_reviews.text: Hands-down my favorite liquid liner! It has a great tip that makes for straight lines! Color lasts all day and doesn’t smear. Worth the money for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life proof!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always loved it, I have a very oily face and my eyeliner used to smudge on to my upper eye lid. This one stays in place and never smudges!
customer_reviews.author: jordyn

customer_reviews.title: TATTOO liner not INK liner
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT the ink liner, it's the tattoo liner. They are two different things.
customer_reviews.author: Dougie Doug

customer_reviews.title: Awesome eyeliner!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Stays on all day no smudges.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Folsom

customer_reviews.title: Best liner I’ve used
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for about a year now best one I’ve every used, it is worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and Smooth
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and apply. Looks sleek and not cake-like.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: empty box with no product
customer_reviews.text: i bought 2 eyeliners and one of the boxes did not contain the product. i was shipped an empty box. very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Good product 👍
customer_reviews.text: Likes the eaz but the tip starts to drybefor I'm done
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! I have oily skin and it stays on all day and doesnt spread all over my eyelids!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: I like it for the most part its long lasting goes ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it for the most part its long lasting goes on nicely but its not quite as pigmented as an eyeliner this pricey should be, needs at least 2 coats
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Price

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this eye liner
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this eye liner! It goes on like a dream from thin to thick line, great for a cat eye.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t last as long as I wanted but easy to apply!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dark liner
customer_reviews.text: The long thin point on the applicator "pen" allows great control. Easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best liner ever! Not exactly waterproof, but holds up really well under tears and sweat! Lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: musiccat

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use! Doesn't smudge or wear off at all.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Glefke

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This package showed up with an empty eyeliner box. $28 for an empty box....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy! ARRIVED EARLY
customer_reviews.text: Arrived way earlier then expected! Favorite liquid eyeliner I'll never switch !
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works really well but I'm not 100% sure it's authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, very black and stays quite well. Will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This product seems too dry coming out of the bottle. It did not leave a clean smooth line when applying. Did I receive a bad line or an old one? I’m really mad at the cost of this because it’s supposed to be Bad A—- where liners are concerned. I really wanted this to work.
customer_reviews.author: Terrie Tolbert

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is my favorite kind. Recently, they changed the tip from a brush like tip to a felt marker kind of tip. Personally, preferred the old tip, but this is still the only eyeliner I use. It lasts all day and is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get me wrong I love this eyeliner. It goes on smoothly and easily. However, I deducted one star because it will not last on your eyes all day UNLESS you wear eye shadow primer. I use Two Faced and my eyeliner and eye shadow stay on all day.
customer_reviews.author: cholletrimbach

customer_reviews.title: throw out all your liquid liners and buy this
customer_reviews.text: This is the only liquid eyeliner anybody should ever buy. The line is very smooth and crisp. The point is fine to make a very light lines or if you pushed down a little harder you can get a very dramatic line without any run off, smudge or build up. I've even fall asleep with it on woke up the next day and my liner is still on perfectly. I will never buy another liquid liner.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Best out there
customer_reviews.text: I'm not about loyalty to brands, and even bounced around Stila and maybe 5 other liner pens and markers from Sephora and Ulta, but this is by far the best. I'm on my 3rd year of using it and don't plan to change.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie C.

customer_reviews.title: This is a yes!!
customer_reviews.text: The liner is WAY better then the Stilla!! I have both, this one has a prettier finish, better line, better color, it’s flat out awesome 👏🏼
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Girl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, my favorite eyeliner i've used to date
customer_reviews.text: This goes on so easily and barely needs a touch up. I love this product, it doesn't wipe off. It comes off maybe after sleeping in it or after hours in the pool, but even then, a really impressive amount is left on. But if you take a make-up remover wipe to it, it's not hard to get off.
customer_reviews.author: Liana

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and to the point
customer_reviews.text: Luuuuv this liner. Sturdy and fine pointed artistic tool! I keep one in my car and Ezra one for backup. Never smears Nor smudges
customer_reviews.author: Cie Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Best liquid liner... NO raccoon eyes, long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. Goes on smooth, stays blackest black all day, no raccoon eyes... this baby stays in place all day. I’ve tried several liners in the past and others since discovering Kay von D’s liquid liner... and I always come back to this one because it’s truly the best!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Jen

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy from this vendor!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years and this one came with different artwork on the product and the brush is not as soft and the liner is extremely runny - I ordered another from Sephora and it is exactly the same as all others I have purchased... I am pretty sure the one I bought from this site was NOT a legitimate Kat Von D product!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hyden

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had a trial size and it was so easy for me to apply it on her. It didn't clunk up after drying and trying to correct mistakes. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Denise

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: The point was a bit to thick for cat eyes but overall, a great product.
customer_reviews.author: brandon653

customer_reviews.title: Finally, an eyeliner that keeps its promise.
customer_reviews.text: I have allergies and wear eyeliner. Bad combination. This product goes on like velvet and actually stays on without running. Would absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this if you have oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin first of all secondly one particularly hot day I applied the eyeliner and was able to wipe it off immediately due to the sweat on my face this liner sucks
customer_reviews.author: Myrtle Tigerman

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting non irritating
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive eyes and this does not bother my eyes at all. Long lasting and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far.
customer_reviews.text: Its very nice and lasts a long time for me.
customer_reviews.author: Yuna Valentine

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with this eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this eyeliner. It lasted for 8 hours on a night out in Vegas! Its perfect and I will continue to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it and doesn't smudge
customer_reviews.text: Will only use this going forward. Love it and doesn't smudge.
customer_reviews.author: McGuiness

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: It stays on through absolutely everything. Double shifts no match for this eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Jump

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as great and the Kat Von D Tattoo liner, but a great runner up.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. No smudging, not clotting, no running during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon purchaser

customer_reviews.title: It goes on nice and smooth but not as black as I would ...
customer_reviews.text: I think I'll stick to Almay. It goes on nice and smooth but not as black as I would like. It lasts once you put on.
customer_reviews.author: Jyoti

customer_reviews.title: Stays all day
customer_reviews.text: This is the best liquid liner I've found and it's the only one I wear now because it doesn't smudge or melt onto my upper eyelid as the day goes on, like other liners do. The line is precise, too.
customer_reviews.author: STwin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! This product was exactly what you'd expect from a Kat Von D product. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Joi @ Hollywood Yesterday

customer_reviews.title: what disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I received the regular one, no the ultra back one...what disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is the best eyeliner I ever bough...not smear and last me all day long!
customer_reviews.author: shopper_lover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product !! I have purchased twice already !
customer_reviews.author: Roxie Lang

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Lost mine. Will be buying another one soon. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: stacey1passion

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good gifts for a friend who really likes eyeliner n Kay Von D
customer_reviews.author: Nandemonaiya

customer_reviews.title: Great product- a little oily/wet.
customer_reviews.text: It's extremely wet- I use a lot of ink liners and have found that the Kat von D liner is extremely wet for ink liners. It's the expected color which is great! A nice dark, black color. I just wish it wasn't such a damp tip!
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It bled all over the place and was very thing. I won't buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Campbell
